##  Final Frequent Update (Promise üòÖ)

This is the **final frequent update** -> sorry for spamming new versions so often.  
From now on, **new releases will be weekly or monthly**.  
Most of the major bugs and performance issues are now fixed and the app is in a much more stable state. üíô

---

##  Performance, Lifecycle & Responsiveness Fixes

###  PathPilot
- Added full **page lifecycle awareness**: background work cancels on hide/unload/navigation.
- ViewModel now tracks active state and skips applying results after deactivation.
- Prevents lingering PowerShell scripts and post-navigation UI/log churn.
- Inventory refresh, switching, and script execution are cancellation-aware and scoped to page lifetime.

###  Startup Manager
- Moved heavy inventory, toggle, delay, and auto-redisable operations **off the UI thread**.
- UI updates remain on the dispatcher for safety.
- Improved scroll smoothness via bitmap caching, tuned virtualization, and deferred scrolling.
- Auto-scroll now reliably scrolls to top after paging, even when overview is toggled.

###  Deep Scan
- Heavy scan and force-delete work now runs on background threads.
- Pagination auto-scrolls to top reliably.
- Smoothed scrolling with tuned virtualization, card bitmap caching, and reduced redraw cost.
- Increased scan parallelism (up to `min(2 √ó cores, 16)`).
- Added **incremental scan cache** to reuse results when targets haven‚Äôt changed.
- Preset picker replaced with a modal overlay list (virtualized, click-off-to-close).
- Added live scan progress (items, bytes, current path) + top progress strip UI.
- Unified byte-size formatting across summaries.

###  Cleanup
- Preview fetching and materialization now run off the UI thread with batched UI updates.
- Smoother scrolling on all screen sizes via softer shadows and higher virtualization cache.
- Delete confirmation now opens **instantly** while prep runs asynchronously.
- Added lightweight loading overlay during confirmation prep.
- Risk calculation refactored into a pure helper to support background execution.

###  Bootstrap & Install UX
- PowerShell callout now stays visible until a **successful detection run** completes.
- Loader overlays now correctly block clicks during fade transitions and release afterward.
- Prevents accidental interaction during install/update/uninstall animations.

###  Known Processes
- Enabled list virtualization with recycling and pixel scrolling for smoother navigation.

---

Thanks for sticking with the rapid updates üôè  
From here on out: **fewer releases**
